TopicTitle: The Bubble Ship from Oblivion! 2-Kerbal VTOL

Articles.Content:
Hey there!

I spent a lot of time designing this to get it to look right. It came out pretty close! The cockpit was tough to get right, but since we don't have glass in the game I settled on this setup

ALBUM

Javascript is disabled. View full album

VIDEO!

Craft File

Bubble Ship

Craft Info Drop-down:

Info!

AG 1 = Horizontal Jets

AG 2 = VTOL Jets

AG 3 = Ladders

G = Landing Legs

F/SAS = Antennas

After loading the craft, be sure to click on the probe module on the front (underneath those guns/radial rocket engines) and click "Control From Here" to have control facing the right direction!

Other than that, nothing quirky about the ship. The thrust limiters are turned down on the horizontal jets. They are above the CoM so keep that in mind if you adjust the thrust limiter at all.

I might try to make an SSTO version in the future! FOr now though I'm content with just zipping around the KSC in it haha.

Enjoy!

In a practical scene, it would provide a yaw for the ship to steer it (I guess you could roll, then pitch, but that would be more complicated.)

This is... so awesome :3 , i have always loved that craft since I first saw the movie! but what is that sphere under the cockpit? Is it just for control?

Ummmm.... It was mainly supposed to look like the little hub on the original design (the place where all the landing legs connect to) but came out to be way bigger than what the original looked like. About 60% of the design was built off of that section though so redesigning it would take a big overhaul. In the end, it does add extra control, but not a ton since it is very close to the CoM (reaction wheels have more effect the further they are away from the CoM!)

Ah, I watched the video on youtube a few minutes ago. Nice ship!

Ya I struggled with VTOL design at first . This design actually uses a VTOL building technique that I talked about in my VTOL building tutorial. You should check it out if you're interested!
